title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rudy Giuliani | 11/5/20
description:
Two days after the election and key states are still counting ballots. The guys review voting updates in Pennsylvania, Arizona, and Georgia. Rudy Giuliani joins with updates on the Trump campaign’s vote-counting lawsuits and details his strategy in Pennsylvania. But Glenn has his own thoughts on the plan. Glenn gives his thoughts on what we’ve learned so far from this election: Millions of Americans still want to preserve this nation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
